p: Infected cells were fixed using 4% paraformaldehyde for 1 h. After being washed three times with PBS, cells were stained with anti-flavivirus envelope antibodies (4G2) at room temperature for 2 h. After being washed once with PBS, cells were stained with Alexa Fluor 488-conjugated goat anti-mouse IgG (Jackson ImmunoResearch Laboratories, Inc). After a final PBS wash, cells were observed using an inverted fluorescence microscope (Olympus CKX41) [ 23, 24].
